results.title: Metformin and the Development of Age-Related Macular Degeneration.
results.text_hl: ...Importance: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has demonstrated protective effects in systemic diseases, including @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular disease@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal diseases@@@, such as @DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@ and @DISEASE_Choroidal_Neovascularization @DISEASE_MESH:D020256 @@@choroidal neovascularization@@@.

citations.NLM: Jindal DA, Hanna J, Shaia JK, Markle J, Rachitskaya A, Kaelber DC, Singh RP, Talcott KE. Metformin and the Development of Age-Related Macular Degeneration. JAMA Ophthalmol. 2025 Sep 18;():. PMID: 40965862

results.title: Metformin and rapamycin protect cells from vital dye-induced damage in retinal pigment epithelial cells and in vivo.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Taken together, these results suggest that @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may diminish vital dye-induced @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal damage@@@ in vivo through activation of autophagy.

results.title: Metformin Protects against NMDA-Induced Retinal Injury through the MEK/ERK Signaling Pathway in Rats
results.text_hl: Next, we investigated the protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ against @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal damage@@@ using cross-sections stained with neuron-specific markers, anti-@GENE_RBFOX3 @GENE_52897 @@@NeuN@@@, and anti-@GENE_PVALB @GENE_25269 @@@parvalbumin@@@ (@GENE_PVALB @GENE_25269 @@@PV@@@) antibodies.

results.text_hl: However, these same medications have @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal toxicities@@@ that must be assessed before implementation of therapeutic care.
